dcterms:description: The ISIC 2018 Skin Lesion dataset comprises 10,015 dermoscopic images categorized by expert pathologists into seven distinct skin lesion classes, with a standardized partition of 7,515 images for training and 2,500 for testing.
dcterms:title: ISIC2018

dcterms:creator: Jeremy Kawahara
Sara Daneshvar
Giuseppe Argenziano
Ghassan Hamarneh
dcterms:description: The Derm7pt dataset comprises over 2,000 clinical and dermoscopy images grouped into 20 distinct classes, providing predictions based on a 7-point checklist for the malignancy of skin lesions.
dcterms:title: Derm7pt

dcterms:creator: Xiaoxiao Sun
Jufeng Yang
Ming Sun
Kai Wang
dcterms:description: The SD-198 dataset contains 198 categories of skin diseases with 6,584 clinical images contributed by patients and dermatologists, showcasing diverse characteristics and divided into training and test sets.
dcterms:title: SD-198
